comments: good physics professor. put in the work and show him you care and youll do fine. if you fall asleep, chew gum or talk back he will call you out and you are done for. if you go to ei without specific questions or atleast attempts at the problem he\'ll make it tough on you.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: A great but tough physics professor. You have to put in the work in order to pass this class. You cannot BS him. When asking for help or going to E.I., be prepared. One of the previous comments about asking for help, it is true. That is him, but honestly if you learn it for yourself, then you will retain it. Practice, practice, those problems.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: e.i. is not a joke. he makes sure you get through the problem. the class is hard and when you ask a question, he tries to make you think about it before giving you the answer, but if you show that you are trying to learn the material, he will keep pushing you in the right direction.
